title: Is this college order correct
content: These are the colleges I will be getting is this arrangement correct???

comments.body: Keep BMSCE at 2. Push RVCE to 5 assuming that you prefer CSE. Rest is perfect.

Trash
First decide if u want cse or ece
Then take decision on college.
Branch is wayy more important than college.
Also ecc cse is basically the same as rr cse so I would suggest u put it above msrit cse
Ik cse cutoffs are low for ecc in kcet for some reason but I don't understand this heard mentality.
Forgot about it so I wrote it last it would be below bmsce
Ec cse is same as rr cse

Regardless of your interest in specializations, always put core CSE above all other specializations. There is nothing special about these specializations they merely exist to increase intake into CS. Especially here in PES, the syllabus between cs and aiml vaires only for the electives offered in 5th and 6th sem. Core CS always has access to electives related to AIML but AIML doesnt have access to all core CS electives. So be wise and put core CS above all.
But aren't both rr and ec almost the same?
SIT Tumkur is the best. Pes is just IIT BLR SIT is IIT Karnataka ðŸ¥°
U have missed out a lot of decent colleges in Bangalore like UVCE, BIT, DSCE

Nah, lol. SIT has horrible coding culture and trash peer group  
honestly, tumkur feels dead
